channel.title: Series on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Rapid7 InsightVM/Nexpose Engine
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Rapid7 Statement https://www.rapid7.com/blog/post/2021/12/14/update-on-log4shells-impact-on-rapid7-solutions-and-systems/?mkt_tok=NDExLU5BSy05NzAAAAGBVaccW1DOLSfEsfTNwEJksv_1nK1muJSFze-Lle90mKtAO78nSdjwPdzqXskNIi9qZCAGQODD42mYRK4YPlQkjhn38E27HQxFHdHAkypEOsh8 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Installations of the InsightVM/Nexpose have “log4j-over-slf4j-1.7.7.jar” packaged in them. This is a different library than log4j-core and is not vulnerable to Log4Shell. CISAGov Last Update: 12/15/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-17 14:04:59 CISAGov Updated communityNotVulnerable.

item.title: Rapid7 Logentries DataHub
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Rapid7 Statement https://www.rapid7.com/blog/post/2021/12/14/update-on-log4shells-impact-on-rapid7-solutions-and-systems/?mkt_tok=NDExLU5BSy05NzAAAAGBVaccW1DOLSfEsfTNwEJksv_1nK1muJSFze-Lle90mKtAO78nSdjwPdzqXskNIi9qZCAGQODD42mYRK4YPlQkjhn38E27HQxFHdHAkypEOsh8 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Linux: Install DataHub_1.2.0.822.deb using the following instructions. Windows: Run version 1.2.0.822 in a Docker container or as a Java command per these instructions. You can find more details here. CISAGov Last Update: 12/15/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-17 14:04:59 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Rapid7 Metasploit Pro
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Rapid7 Statement https://www.rapid7.com/blog/post/2021/12/14/update-on-log4shells-impact-on-rapid7-solutions-and-systems/?mkt_tok=NDExLU5BSy05NzAAAAGBVaccW1DOLSfEsfTNwEJksv_1nK1muJSFze-Lle90mKtAO78nSdjwPdzqXskNIi9qZCAGQODD42mYRK4YPlQkjhn38E27HQxFHdHAkypEOsh8 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Metasploit Pro ships with log4j but has specific configurations applied to it that mitigate Log4Shell. A future update will contain a fully patched version of log4j. CISAGov Last Update: 12/15/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-17 14:04:59 CISAGov Updated communityNotVulnerable.
